plugins.author: VAST Dynamics
plugins.name: Vaporizer2
plugins.description: Hybrid wavetable additive / subtractive VST / AU / AAX / CLAP / LV2 synthesizer / sampler workstation

plugins.author: Takamitsu Endo
plugins.name: IterativeSinCluster
plugins.description: IterativeSinCluster is an additive synthesizer. This synth computes 512 sine waves for each note to make tone cluster. I somehow thought "iterative sin" is a valid term. Correct term is "recursive sine".

plugins.author: Takamitsu Endo
plugins.name: CubicPadSynth
plugins.description: CubicPadSynth is a wavetable synthesizer which uses PADsynth algorithm to generate oscillator tables. Cubic interpolation is used to get smooth sound even at inaudible low frequency range. LFO waveform can be directly drawn.

plugins.author: Takamitsu Endo
plugins.name: LightPadSynth
plugins.description: LightPadSynth is a lightweight version of CubicPadSynth. For efficiency, interpolation is changed to linear. Also pitch modulation is omitted. Instead, a delay is added for each voice.

plugins.author: Takamitsu Endo
plugins.name: WaveCymbal
plugins.description: WaveCymbal is an attempt to make a cymbal synthesizer with banded wave-guide model. The result is more like dragging bunch of empty cans or thin metal plate on asphalt rather than cymbal.

plugins.author: Takamitsu Endo
plugins.name: CollidingCombSynth
plugins.description: CollidingCombSynth is an experimental synthesizer which sounds like bowed string. Equipped with 24 Karplus-Strong string models which collide to each other. Tuning of pitch is possible, but difficult. So mostly suitable for sound effects.

plugins.author: Takamitsu Endo
plugins.name: TrapezoidSynth
plugins.description: TrapezoidSynth is a monophonic synthesizer equipped with 2 trapezoid oscillator. Trapezoid oscillator is based on PTR (Polynomial Transition Regions) and it has a drawback that increasing noise at high frequency. Therefore 8 times oversampled. 2 pitch shifters are added to make some chord.

plugins.author: Takamitsu Endo
plugins.name: FDNCymbal
plugins.description: FDNCymbal is a cymbal sound synthesizer. It can also be used as an effect. Unlike the name, most of metallic texture comes from Schroeder allpass section rather than FDN (feedback delay network). FDN section makes nice impact sound when `FDN.Time` is short. Tremolo is added to simulate wobbling of cymbal.

plugins.author: Takamitsu Endo
plugins.name: SyncSawSynth
plugins.description: SyncSawSynth is a 32 voice polyphonic synthesizer using up to 10th order PTR sawtooth oscillator. Just a basic synthesizer but very easy to make a noise similar to low battery sound of some toys.

plugins.author: Takamitsu Endo
plugins.name: EnvelopedSine
plugins.description: EnvelopedSine is an additive synthesizer that computes 64 sine waves for each note. Difference to IterativeSinCluster is that this synth has AD envelope and saturator for each oscillator. EnvelopedSine is better suited for percussive sounds.

plugins.author: Sjoerd van Kreel
plugins.name: Firefly Synth
plugins.description: Firefly Synth

plugins.author: Freepats
plugins.name: Glasses Of Water
plugins.description: Musical instrument made with glasses of water, recorded with an AKG Perception 120 microphone.

plugins.author: Freepats
plugins.name: Upright Piano KW
plugins.description: Kawai upright piano, recorded in a living room using a Zoom H1 portable recorder mounted on a tripod in front of the piano.

plugins.author: discoDSP
plugins.name: OPL
plugins.description: OPL FM synth plugin emulates a digital sound synthesis chip developed by Yamaha in the mid 1980s

plugins.author: Freepats
plugins.name: Spanish Classical Guitar
plugins.description: Spanish classical guitar with nylon strings, recorded with an AKG Perception 120 microphone.

plugins.author: michael02022
plugins.name: Basic Harmonica
plugins.description: Basic harmonica.

plugins.author: Freepats
plugins.name: Synthesizer Percussion
plugins.description: Drumkit sounds commonly used in vintage electronic music made with analog synthesizers.

plugins.author: Freepats
plugins.name: Hang D Minor
plugins.description: Pitched steel percussion instrument tuned in D minor, recorded using a Zoom H1 portable recorder mounted on a tripod.

plugins.author: DSmolken
plugins.name: Black and Green Guitars
plugins.description: Black Hofner Club and Green Gretsch Anniversary electric guitars

plugins.author: discoDSP
plugins.name: OB-Xd
plugins.description: Based on the Oberheim OB-X. It attempts to recreate its sound and behaviours, but as the original was very limited in some important ways a number of things were added or altered to the original design. The OB-Xd was designed to sound as good and as rich as the original. It implements micro random detuning which is a big part of that sound.

plugins.author: Alexander Holm
plugins.name: Salamander Grand Piano
plugins.description: Yamaha C5, recorded with two AKG c414 disposed in an AB position ~12cm above the strings.

plugins.author: Glen MacArthur
plugins.name: AVL Drumkits
plugins.description: Black Pearl and Red Zepplin drumkits recorded with 5 velocity layers per kit piece.

plugins.author: Versilian Studios
plugins.name: Virtuosity Drums
plugins.description: Contemporary Jazz drum kit library, performed with sticks, recorded at Virtuosity Musical Instruments in Boston, MA.

plugins.author: Louis Gorenfeld
plugins.name: Digits
plugins.description: Digits is a phase distortion synthesizer inspired by Casio's CZ series but takes that form of synthesis to the limit. Create warm pads, glitchy sounds, dirty basses, filthy sweeps, screaming leads, and anything in-between.

plugins.author: Artem Popov
plugins.name: Andes
plugins.description: Andes is a software synthesiser plugin in early stages of development. The core of Andes is an original oscillator which uses a pseudo-3D version of Perlin noise to produce distinctively digital sound.

plugins.author: Jean Pierre Cimalando
plugins.name: ADLplug
plugins.description: FM synthesizer based on OPL3 and OPN2 sound chip emulations. Synthesis of melodic and percussive instruments, support for dynamic parameterization and automation.

plugins.author: Jean Pierre Cimalando
plugins.name: OPNplug
plugins.description: FM synthesizer based on OPL3 and OPN2 sound chip emulations. Synthesis of melodic and percussive instruments, support for dynamic parameterization and automation.

plugins.author: Filipe Coelho
plugins.name: Kars
plugins.description: Simple karplus-strong plucked string synth.

plugins.author: Brain Control
plugins.name: Tunefish
plugins.description: Tunefish is a tiny virtual analogue synth that was originally developed  for the 64k intros of the demo group Brain Control.

plugins.author: Oxe Software
plugins.name: Oxe
plugins.description: 8 operator frequency modulation synthesizer.

plugins.author: Akai
plugins.name: Splendid Grand Piano
plugins.description: Steinway piano with 4 velocity layers

plugins.author: Filipe Coelho
plugins.name: Nekobi
plugins.description: Simple single-oscillator synth based on the Roland TB-303.

plugins.author: Jeff Learman
plugins.name: jRhodes3c
plugins.description: 1977 Rhodes Mark I Stage 73 piano

plugins.author: Matt Tytel
plugins.name: Helm
plugins.description: Polyphonic semi-modular synthesizer with a flexible modulation system.

plugins.author: Birch San
plugins.name: JuicySFplugin
plugins.description: SoundFont synthesizer for playing General Midi music using sf2 files.

plugins.author: Keijiro Takahashi
plugins.name: VST2413
plugins.description: FM synthesizer based on YM2413 (OPLL) emulator. YM2413 is well known as low-cost FM sound chip, and was used on Sega Master System and FM-PAC sound expansion cartridge for MSX. VST2413 can resemble that warm texture of sound and may be well suited for use in 'post 8-bit era style' chiptune music.

plugins.author: Paul Battersby
plugins.name: Virtual Playing Orchestra
plugins.description: Orchestral sample library featuring section and solo instruments for woodwinds, brass, strings and percussion

plugins.author: Jeff Learman
plugins.name: jSteelDrum
plugins.description: C Steel Drum (a.k.a. 'steel pan') hand-made in Trinidad.

plugins.author: Pascal Gauthier
plugins.name: Dexed
plugins.description: Synthesizer closely modeled on the Yamaha DX7

plugins.author: DSmolken
plugins.name: Horse Pulse
plugins.description: Bass Tagelharpa played pizzicato

plugins.author: Joakim Frostegård
plugins.name: OctaSine
plugins.description: Frequency modulation-based synthesizer plugin.

plugins.author: Miguel Moreno
plugins.name: EP-MK1
plugins.description: Real-time physical model of an Electric Piano.

plugins.author: Wilkinson Audio
plugins.name: Naked Drums
plugins.description: Multi-mic drumkit, with 10 round-robins, up to 5 velocity layers and several mic layers (Direct, OH, Close room, Far rooms, Mid-side and Wide OH).

plugins.author: Glen MacArthur
plugins.name: AVL Percussions
plugins.description: 11 percussions instruments (Cajon, Woodblock, Handclap, Fingersnap, Bongos, Maracas, Tambourine, Cowbell, Claves, Waterglass) recorded with 5 velocity layers per piece.

plugins.author: Sam Greene
plugins.name: Sam's Sonor
plugins.description: Sonor Force 3001 drum kit sampled with 4 velocity levels for each part.

plugins.author: Filipe Coelho
plugins.name: Carla
plugins.description: Audio plugin host, with support for many audio drivers and plugin formats

plugins.author: DSmolken
plugins.name: Bear Sax
plugins.description: 1926 Conn baritone saxophone including sustained notes and breath noise.

plugins.author: DSmolken
plugins.name: Hungarian Zither
plugins.description: Hungarian 'prime' zither. A rectangular instrument with over a dozen strings, mostly tuned to G, with two melody courses and the rest as drones.

plugins.author: DSmolken
plugins.name: Double Bass
plugins.description: 1958 Otto Rubner double bass played arco and pizzicato with additional miscellaneous noises.

plugins.author: SFZTools
plugins.name: Sfizz
plugins.description: SFZ parser and synth c++ library, providing AU / LV2 / VST3 plugins and JACK standalone client.

plugins.author: TAL Software
plugins.name: TAL-Noisemaker
plugins.description: Virtual analog synthesizer with a great sound and low CPU usage.

plugins.author: TheWaveWarden
plugins.name: Odin
plugins.description: 12-voice polyphonic semi-modular synthesizer. Earth shattering basses, exquisite leads or mad FX, Odin's got them all! Use the classic sound of analog waveforms - or draw your own.

plugins.author: Onsen Audio
plugins.name: OS-251
plugins.description: Pure digital lo-fi synthesizer plugin

plugins.author: Zandro Reveille
plugins.name: OPL-3 FM 128M
plugins.description: SoundFont designed to simulate the classic MIDI sound of the Sound Blaster 16 (and other YM262 enabled hardware)

plugins.author: Rytmenpinne
plugins.name: Salamander Drumkit
plugins.description: Drumkit recorded in the garage with an acoustic sound/feel.

plugins.author: Clearly Broken
plugins.name: Ninjas 2
plugins.description: Easy to use sample slicer, quick slicing of sample and auto-mapping slices to midi note numbers.

plugins.author: Thomas Arndt
plugins.name: Monique
plugins.description: Monophonic, realtime, subtractive-synthesis bass-and-lead software synthesizer

plugins.author: DSmolken
plugins.name: War Tuba
plugins.description: Tuba played by Jakub Lewicki (aka Ignacy Woland of the band Hañba).

plugins.name: Surge XT
plugins.author: Surge Synth Team
plugins.description: Hybrid synthesizer featuring many synthesis techniques, a great selection of filters, a flexible modulation engine, a smorgasbord of effects, and modern features like MPE and microtuning.

plugins.name: Sfizz
plugins.author: SFZTools
plugins.description: SFZ parser and synth c++ library, providing AU / LV2 / VST3 plugins and JACK standalone client.
